name: Submarine Runner (itch) (Khelben Leonard)
description:
*DESCRIPTION*

Submarine Runner is a small 2d endless runner, where you are the pilot of a submarine navigating through a shiver of sharks, old mines, a bunch of pointy rocks. There are also powerups that can help you, like a clock to slow down time, a bomb to destroy everything on the screen, and some extra hearts to repair the sub when you take damage. How long you can keep your submarine floating?

*CONTROLS*

MOVE - WASD

*CREDITS*

Made by: Khelben Leonard

Background Art by: Alucard

Made in: Processing
